name: Valley Public  School
phone: Nishan Khatri, SLC 2008 Batch What I am today is because of my time as student in Valley Public High School. I look back my primary and secondary education days and feel how lucky I was to be able to get such a wonderful beginning. I have been living and running my own business in the USA for the past few years. My transition from Nepal to USA was made so easy mainly due to my education and upbringing in Valley Public. My language proficiency, my confidence in my own ability to do things was imparted in me by inspiring teachers to whom I owe my great respect. I have my respect and admiration for the service Valley Public is giving to the Nepali community. If any one of the Valley Public students are thinking of studying in the USA please feel free to contact me through Valley Public.

name: RAI School
phone: Due to COVID-19 situation, we are not having entrance exams for any of the classes. For admission in Class 1-9, simply fill and submit the admission form with copies of previous mark sheets and any other certificates of the student. This will be followed by an interview and an orientation session welcoming the child to the school. For admission in class XI, a student must have passed/appeared for CBSE/ SEE or equivalent from a recognized institution/ board. The student should have scored 60% and above to be eligible for admission. If the results have not been declared, we provide provisional admission. To book a visit for a school tour, contact 9801966967.
